author: Brad Colbow
description:
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com
XP Pen Magic Note Pad https://amzn.to/41GAeWz (Affiliate Link)
Magic Notepad on XP Pen's site https://www.xp-pen.com/store/buy/magic-note-pad.html

At first when I heard about this tablet I thought it was an E-Ink display, but it's not, it's a standard LCD android tablet that has some different modes that makes it feel like a Kindle or Remarkable tablet. This also comes with the XP-Pen stylus that I really enjoyed drawing with.
